articles.author: Pawan Mudaliar
articles.title: Tata Tiago and Tigor CNG AMT mileage revealed! - CarWale
articles.description: Under the hood, the Tata twins are powered by a 1.2-litre, three-cylinder, petrol mill that churns 85bhp and 113Nm of torque. In the CNG mode, the same engine produces 72bhp and 95Nm of torque and returns a claimed fuel efficiency of 28.06km/kg.
articles.content:
• Powered by a 1.2-litre petrol-CNG engine
  • Prices in India start at Rs. 7.90 lakh (ex-showroom)
